name: photo-shop
description: A photo shop, not to be confused with Photoshop ;)

scripts.bd:cf-workers: set -x; npm run build:cf-workers; npm run deploy:cf-workers;
scripts.build:cf-workers: set -x; find cloudflare/ -name "wrangler.toml" -exec sh -c 'set -x; S="$(dirname "${1}")"; D="_${S}"; npx esbuild --bundle --tree-shaking=true --legal-comments=inline --target=chrome58,firefox57,safari11 --outfile="${D}/main.js" "${S}/main.js";' tmp-sh '{}' \;
scripts.deploy:cf-workers: set -x; find cloudflare/ -name "wrangler.toml" -exec sh -c 'set -x; S="$(dirname "${1}")"; D="_${S}"; cp "${S}/wrangler.toml" "${D}"; npx wrangler deploy --config "${D}/wrangler.toml"; if [ -f "${S}/_secret-vars.json" ]; then npx wrangler secret:bulk "${S}/_secret-vars.json" --config "${D}/wrangler.toml"; fi' tmp-sh '{}' \;

author: Joey C. DiGiorgio
